posts.post_content:
One of my dupes. Ideally I'd love to trade it for other signed pre-WWI cards, but I'm interested in unsigned T206 cards, too. I would also consider a cash offer.. Email [url]SignedT206@gmail.com[/url] if you're interested...

From [URL="http://picasaweb.google.com/pmifsud3d/AutographedT206?authkey=Gv1sRgCNHhgMuiptWNcg&feat=embedwebsite"]Autographed T206[/URL]

I am not at home so I can't email directly, if your interested in a trade for some of the T206 I have LMK.  Thanks

James G

One of the other dupes might interest me.

Rawn
Another bump -- still available.  Listening to cash and card offers.
